welcome.title: Software developer
welcome.p1: I have 3 years of experience in mobile development with Flutter, having participated in several projects that have helped me grow significantly as a developer, learning to write better code and solve real-world problems.
welcome.p2: I enjoy writing clean, scalable, and easy to maintain code.

skills.heading: My skills
skills.p1: I apply these technologies to build efficient, scalable, and well-designed solutions, paying close attention to both performance and user experience. My skills go beyond tools, they involve writing clean code, continuously learning, and adapting to new challenges.
skills.p2: If these technologies align with what you’re looking for, I’d be excited to collaborate on new projects.
